name: lighthouse
description: - **React.js** – Provides the foundation for building the interactive, component-based user interface of Lighthouse. - **Tailwind CSS** – Utility-first CSS framework that ensures a clean, responsive, and modern UI design without writing custom CSS from scratch. - **Recharts / Map Libraries (Leaflet, Mapbox, etc.)** – Power the visualization features such as interactive heatmaps, dashboards, and trend graphs.
